# 解析请求中的FormData数据

  • 请求：content-type = multipart/form-data

    const { file } = req;
let formData = new FormData();
formData.append(`file`, file);

koa2-connect-history-api-fallback - https://www.npmjs.com/package/koa2-connect-history-api-fallback [真假路由处理]

# Gulp构建工具相关
